-- | Rest driver for Happstack.

@package rest-happstack
@version 0.2.10.8

module Rest.Driver.Happstack.Docs

-- | Web interface for documentation
apiDocsHandler :: (ServerMonad m, MonadPlus m, FilterMonad Response m, MonadIO m) => String -> String -> Api a -> m Response

module Rest.Driver.Happstack
apiToHandler :: (Functor m, MonadPlus m, MonadIO m) => Api (ServerPartT m) -> ServerPartT m Response
apiToHandler' :: (Functor n, MonadPlus n, MonadIO n) => Run m (ServerPartT n) -> Api m -> ServerPartT n Response
instance (Functor m, MonadPlus m, MonadIO m) => Rest (ServerPartT m)
